mapper.select: select calendar_seq, title, content, to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(startDate, 'hh24:mi') AS startDate , to_char(endDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(endDate, 'hh24:mi') AS endDate , backgroundColor from personalCalendar_table

select C.calendar_seq, C.title, C.content, to_char(C.startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(C.startDate, 'hh24:mi') AS startDate , to_char(C.endDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(C.endDate, 'hh24:mi') AS endDate , C.color, D.department_name, CC.category_name from department_table D join companyCalendar_table C on D.department_seq = C.fk_department_seq join companyCalendar_category CC on C.calendar_category = CC.category_num
